column4: Can someone please help me with this? http://pastebin.com/m18eb44ad
Can someone please help me with this? http://pastebin.com/m18eb44ad

feistyfawn
; how old is the machine, and wich type is it again?
brand new machine
it is almost same specs as ubundell except gfx card
; normally intel is well supported , but in your case it might be to new, you see, linux hackers need time to figure out hardware
; you are running from livecd right?
i already installed
; if you run from livecd , you get the same thing ? or try an older ubuntu version to see if the same thing happens
yes
; lspci --vv ( wich is v v )
http://pastebin.com/m760dc5a0
; really odd , and what does not work ? sound / network etc?
i mean everytime i update kernel i need to reinstall ethernet drivers
; kernel updates can mess up installation , that does happen
i just want a stable install with all hardware with their drivers, if they are not out yet, i guess i can wait, but im pretty sure dell has the drivers considering they sell the ubundell
; try to create an working ubuntu , and not update the kernel ...
; Dell themselve also want better drivers , they are working on it woth the hardware vendors
so you are saying dell are sending out these systems without full compatibility and all the drivers?
; so best for you is to create an working desktop , and not to mess to much with it when its stable..( no kernel updates and the like )
do you recommend the 64 bit or 32 bit for my system, considering i have a intel core 2 duo 6420
